description: Harland boxwood (Buxus harlandii) is a beautiful evergreen shrub with bright, glossy foliage. This fast-growing shrub is quite hardy, adaptable to a variety of climates, and needs very little maintenance. Its distinctive features are its dark green, ovate leaves and small, round or ovate yellowish-green flower clusters. Its fragrant blossoms are loved by both wildlife and gardeners, and its bright leaves make an attractive backdrop for many colorful flowers. Its slow growth habit and dense foliage make it the perfect choice for a hedge or topiary accent in any garden. Harland boxwood is truly an amazing plant with its many desirable features and spectacular display of color.
